entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
